info.author: Niklas Pechan
info.description:
CDATA Api Endpoint Testing

This package provides a light framework for testing internal Xero sites like dynamite and meeseeks.
Currently it checks to see that the specified endpoints return a 200 code.
The testing is run entirely from the command line. To run a test, ensure that the command line directory matches
with the install directory of the package, and then use:

    > python test_generator.py <test_url> <endpoint_1> <endpoint_2> ...

where <test_url> and <endpoint_i> are strings.

To use the package in a docker container with a locally hosted version of the website, use:

    > docker build -t {image name}    # construct the image of the website (ensure that the active directory has access to the Docker file for the specific website)

    > docker run -d -p 5555:5555 --entrypoint "python" {image name} "runserver.py"{or equivalent command}    # start the container
    
    > docker exec {container name} python /{path}/test_generator.py <test_url> <endpoint_1> <endpoint_2> ...    # test the website
info.name: cdata_api_endpoint_test
info.summary: tests api endpoints of internal Xero sites ensuring they return a 200 code
